title: Enhancing Practical Software Development Competencies: Responsive Multimodal Oral Presentation Skills Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can plan and execute a 10-minute professional oral presentation integrating multiple modalities (voice, visual aids, nonverbal expressions).
Learners can enhance linguistic fluency (pronunciation, intonation, lexical diversity) and nonverbal skills (gestures, eye contact, body language) through feedback-driven iterative practice.
Learners can acquire practical presentation skills to flexibly respond to unpredictable audience reactions in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
